Wrapper for computing the criticality, i.e., the value of the measure.

class commonroad_crime.data_structure.configuration.CriMeConfiguration(config: Union[ListConfig, DictConfig])[source]

Bases: object

Class to hold criticality-measures-related configurations

print_configuration_summary()[source]
update(ego_id: Optional[int] = None, sce: Optional[Union[Scene, Scenario]] = None, CLCS: Optional[CurvilinearCoordinateSystem] = None)[source]

Updates criticality configuration based on the given attributes.

Possible ways of updating the configuration: 1. No attribute is given: load the scenario and evaluate the criticality of all obstacles. 2. scenario 3. scene 4. scenario + clcs 5. scene + clcs

Builds configuration from default, scenario-specific, and commandline config files.

Args:

name_scenario (str): considered scenario path_root(str): root path of the package dir_config (str): directory storing configurations

Constructs default configuration by accumulating yaml files.

Collects all configuration files ending with ‘.yaml’.

Sets necessary paths of the configuration builder.

class commonroad_crime.data_structure.scene.Scene(time_step: int, scenario: Scenario, dt: Optional[float] = None, scene_id: Optional[str] = None)[source]

Bases: Scenario

a snapshot of the environment including the scenery and dynamic elements, as well as all actors’ and observers’ self-representations, and the relationships among those entities

Returns a list of all static obstacles in the scene.

Returns a list of all obstacles roles in the scene.
